explains: adj. 忠实的，忠诚的；如实的，忠于原事（物）的；忠贞的；可信任的，可信赖的
wordGroup: old faithful 追随者；忠实的支持者

sentences.en: I have been a faithful reader of your newspaper for many years.
sentences.cn: 我是贵报多年来的忠实读者。

sentences.en: She was rewarded for her 40 years' faithful service with the company.
sentences.cn: 她为公司忠诚服务了40年，因而获得奖赏。

sentences.en: I'm very faithful when I love someone.
sentences.cn: 当我爱一个人时我是非常忠贞的。
